data.sql: select f1.CostCenter AS Cost_Center, f1.Hours AS Total_Chargable_Hours, (f2.Hours - CC.ManagerHC) AS Headcount, ((f2.Hours - CC.ManagerHC) * target_hours) AS Target_Hours, (f1.Hours / ((f2.Hours - CC.ManagerHC) * target_hours)) AS UR from (select * from Finance where CostCenter in (select CostCenter from CC) AND Item="Total Chargeable hours (All resources)" AND EmployeeGroup='1') f1 inner join (select * from Finance where CostCenter in (select CostCenter from CC) AND Item="Average Headcount" AND EmployeeGroup='1') f2 on f2.CostCenter = f1.CostCenter inner join CC on f1.CostCenter = CC.CostCenter order by UR DESC limit 10;
